about_the_game:
Court magician of King Puppetuppon. He is an example that huge genius is followed by huge madness. Once he spilled his drink on a pile of stones and by accident created an enraged golem. This was probably his biggest feat because his job was to create cream for splinters in the royal ass. He wants to show that his fireballs and lightning bolts can be useful for more than providing light in a castle.

This product is an addition content to BeatMe! It contains one playable character with unique skills and playstyle.

Explore new posibilities, with new characters in this lovely party brawler!
